Naturally we want to give something back for the money we get. Movie- and book credits are a part of it, as well as advertising spaces on our car. 
The body of the car is covered in 4000 stickers (sticker bombing). Because of its "design" the car gathers curiosity everywhere, its photographed and filmed all the time. The cow skull we found in Kazakhstan and mounted to the hood just adds to its fabulous design  and is the icing on the cake.
For our sponsors we have reserved spaces in the side-windows of the car, the rear window and on the hood of the car. Individually we can make a deal for a whole window, or a part of it (please contact us).
The solar panels in the side windows, which are no longer working,  will be clad with felt, like you see in one of the pictures. So your ad will be much more accentuated.
According to this also the foil on the hood will be removed. On the dark grey surface a colourful ad will be nicely visible. 
With us your advertising or a message goes around the world, as part of a unique car and an amazing journey.
We can print a graphic you mail us on our Canon Selphy Photoprinter and glue it into the car. If you prefer to send us a sticker we are going to provide you with the adress of an accomodation, most likely in Russia, where we stay for a timeframe to fetch parcels. As shipment service we recommend DHL or FED-EX.
Notice for our English sponsors: 
To avoid confusion we put the perks (Indiegogo packages) only in German online. We will happily explain the details of the packages individually in English, please contact us on 
summersun.at@gmail.com









Other possibilities
What else can we do? A proposal for your girlfriend, written into the sand of a beautiful lonely beach, photographed, filmed, cut and send to you? Pictures from a beautiful place you always wanted to see yourself? Or do you want  to challenge us (you don' t dare to...) . Everything is possible. Write us on 
 summersun.at@gmail.comand we'll see what we can do.

How do we use the money?
For 8000-9000 km, the next milestone of our journey which lasts for 2.5 months, we need approx 1000 EUR for gas. 
Then we need some visa for SEA - we budget 400 EUR for them. 
Our monthly costs of living are approx. 900 EUR. 
This sums up to 3650 EUR for 2.5 months, the rest is for Indiegogo fees


Our mission
Apart from having adventures we want to make the world more tangible, far from news which live from telling bad things, far from the mainstream. We want to show friendship and beautiful nature, great places, the usual and the unusual things. 
We want to help building bridges. Bridges to countries, places and people one never sees in the news, a tourist will never see either. To accomplish this we have our car, a Chrysler Voyager AWD, equipped with everything we need for our daily life.




Austria isn't a well known place
Our second goal is to bring our country, Austria, on the maps. The small, beautiful Austria. With a lot of pantomime, Google Translate and the classic dictionary we have described a lot of times where to find our little alpine republic and that there are no kangaroos around.
Whilst in bigger towns some people may know where to put us, we are the gossip of the day in smaller towns and villages. We shake many hands and hug a lot of people. The very first Austrians some people may ever have met where friendly and we hope that this sticks to the mind.




Are there any risks?

Its possible that our car gets damaged to the point of destruction, by an accident or due to a mechanical fault. This would be bad for our sponsors with advertising on the car, but sadly it can happen and it is a possible risk. Within the last thirteen thousand kilometres the only major problem we had was a broken drive shaft, but there is no guaranty.
we can't collect enough money and have to turn around. Even the fastest way home is a distance of over seven thousand kilometres where the car gets seen. Stories are sufficient enough for a book as well as a movie, as we have so far collected over 500GB of data. 

 we have to stop because of illness, leave the car behind and fly back home. For the transport and all costs related to illness we have an insurance. In this case we will try to come back and travel on as soon as possible. We are still not tired of travelling.

What happens after South East Asia?
And how do we pay for the journey, as we want to go all around the world. 
We have prepared a source of income via the internet. This source works well and we used to live on it some years ago, but later changed into the security of jobs.  But this source needs some time to kick off and we work on it all the time. We effectively lack the money to get us through a time frame of approximately two and a half months.  If this campaign is successful, the rest works out and we are back in the race to go around the world.

No money..
doesn't mean that you can't support us. Share our campaign on Facebook, Google Plus and the many other social networks. Indiegogo has a function to that easily directly on the page. Tell your friends about us, sometimes just the right person needs to hear about a project at the right time. You help us a lot this way, thanks so much.
Do you want to help us, but have no paypal account - no problem, send us an email (summersun.at@gmail.com) we will definately find a solution. And now - go Indiegogo go, please keep us going  :)

story:
HAVE YOU SEEN THE NEWS LATELY?

Everywhere you look, Russia and its military are making headlines:

>  Dropping bombs in Syria

>  Flying into Turkish, Swedish, and British airspace (among others)

>  Dominating events in Ukraine

How can we explain this behaviour?  It seems as though Russia has suddenly turned aggressive for no good reason – but is this true?

My name is Ted Seay, and I’m very worried.

Worried that certain world leaders seem interested in reviving the Cold War.

Worried that there are politicians and generals out there who still think that fighting and winning a nuclear war is actually possible.

Most of all, though, I’m concerned that all of these worries could be turned into realities by the 180 American nuclear bombs which are based in Europe.  These B61 gravity bombs[1], which most people in Europe are not even aware of, are a hidden cause of huge tension between Russia and the West.  People in all five countries where these U.S. bombs are based would also be concerned, if they only knew the tremendous costs and dangers associated with these weapons.

As I said, I’m Ted Seay, and my organisation, BASIC, the British American Security Information Council, aims to do something about this problem.  That’s why we have organised this Indiegogo campaign to send U.S. nuclear gravity bombs back home where they belong.

THE REAL PROBLEM

American nuclear weapons on bases in Europe are a totally unnecessary, expensive, dangerous catalyst to EU-Russia confrontation.  NATO’s 28 members cannot reach a consensus to send the bombs back home to the U.S.[2], and the Obama administration cannot or will not do anything about them, either[3].  That means it has to be up to the five NATO countries where these bombs are based to order the U.S. government to take them home – and that’s where BASIC and this campaign come in.

Today, B61 nuclear bombs can be carried from America by the long-range U.S. stealth bomber, the B-2, to attack targets anywhere on earth[4] – so why does NATO plan to load these same bombs in short-range fighter aircraft, such as F-16s, which only have a combat radius of a few hundred miles?[5]

Back when B61 bombs were based in West Germany, and their targets were Soviet tank armies in East Germany, 250 miles away at most, delivering them by short-range fighter jet was at least possible.  Today, there are no targets outside the EU reachable without dangerous, slow and expensive midair refuelling – and let’s not forget that other NATO aircraft would have to fly ahead of the B61s and blow up enemy air defences first.

This whole idea is so crazy, and so hard for Russia to believe, let alone fear, that NATO has taken to calling the B61s in Europe “political weapons”.  There’s just one problem – they don’t work politically, either.

All 28 NATO countries must agree to release nuclear weapons to NATO’s military authorities during a crisis, and there are strong indications that this could never happen, especially during a crisis.  Germany would not want to go on record as having approved a nuclear attack on Russia from Büchel air base, nor would Turkey agree to a nuclear attack on Iran from İncirlik air base.

The other real problem with the whole NATO scenario is that preparing NATO F-16 and Tornado attack aircraft to carry B61 bombs now requires several weeks of lead time – hardly useful in a crisis.

So – if you were Russia, how would you feel about NATO?  When you believed you had been promised, as early as 1990, that NATO would not expand even “one inch to the east”[6]?  Especially after you announced, publicly and repeatedly, that you were against any NATO expansion that involved your immediate neighbours, like Georgia or Ukraine, yet had those statements ignored, when NATO promised both countries in 2008 that they would become members of NATO[7]?  Would you be inclined to believe NATO when it said B61s were not aimed at Russia?  Or would you be sceptical?

Two other quick points:  First, what about Russia’s short-range nuclear weapons?  We want to get rid of them, too – but there is a fundamental difference between Russia’s short-range nukes, which are located in Russia, and America’s short-range nukes, which are located all over Europe.  BASIC believes that, once U.S. B61s are back home where they belong, serious negotiations can begin with Russia on, first, moving their short-range nuclear weapons out of range of targets in Europe (beyond the Ural Mountains, for example, where they would not threaten any other countries, either).

Finally, it must be pointed out that the 180 B61s, however much money is being spent on guarding them, represent an extremely tempting target for terrorists looking to outdo the 11 September 2001 or 7 July 2005 attacks[8].  The safest place for them by far is back in America.

WHAT BASIC CAN DO

BASIC has a cost-saving, efficient plan for dealing with U.S. B61 bombs in Europe, and as the UK’s oldest organisation working exclusively on this issue, we have the expert knowledge and experience to make it work.

In November 2013, I went to The Hague to brief Dutch Members of Parliament about the B61 bombs stored at Kleine Brogel air base.  The result of one brief visit to the Netherlands by one BASIC representative?  A week after hearing my briefing points, the Dutch Parliament voted to refuse to certify future Dutch F-35 fighter-bombers to carry B61s – a demonstration of the power of information.

Dutch Members of Parliament were lied to by their government that NATO nuclear issues were classified and couldn’t be discussed in Parliament.  When they heard the facts in our briefings, MPs in the Netherlands took action.  We at BASIC are very concerned that these lies may also be used by other host governments – and we aim to find out.

We are financing our BANish The Bombs 2015 lobbying campaign on a shoestring – as we collect each £10,000, we will plan and execute briefings for Parliamentarians and anti-nuclear activists in another of NATO’s five B61 “host” nations: Belgium, Germany, Italy, the Netherlands and Turkey.  If we reach our goal of £50,000, this crucial information will have reached them all.

While in the five NATO capitals, we will present Parliamentarians with the documented truth about B61 bombs, U.S. government plans to upgrade them at enormous cost, and the importance of getting the entire class of antiquated weapons out of Europe, starting with U.S. bombs which are a long way from home.

HOW YOU CAN HELP

We’re not asking for much, and frankly in terms of perks and fancy giveaways, we’re not offering much, either.[9]

What we ARE offering is the chance for you and your friends to make a difference.  The next time you’re down at the pub with friends, challenge them to #ForgoAFiver – instead of chipping in for the next round, set £5 aside for BANish The Bombs 2015.  Then let your friends know what you’re doing and why, and encourage them to check out #BANishTheBombs2015 and this campaign.

So that’s it – if you can #ForgoAFiver, you can help us send the B61s, creaky relics of the 1950s, back to the U.S. for recycling.  Among other things, this will:

> Send a strong message to Non-Nuclear Weapons States that NATO and Europe are serious about the Nuclear Non-Proliferation Treaty (NPT)

> Remove a major thorn from NATO-Russia relations

> Allow meaningful discussions to begin on getting Russia’s short-range nuclear weapons out of Europe, too

#ForgoAFiver

#BANishTheBombs2015


...and let's not overlook the alternative to getting B61 nuclear bombs out of Europe:  NATO To Return to Cold War Nuclear Drills?

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[1] http://fas.org/programs/ssp/nukes/publications1/Brief2014_PREPCOM2.pdf

[2] http://www.armscontrol.org/printpdf/5110

[3] http://www.una.org.uk/sites/default/files/SEAY%20WEB%201.pdf, see page 9.

[4] https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Northrop_Grumman_B-2_Spirit

[5] https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/General_Dynamics_F-16_Fighting_Falcon

[6] http://www.spiegel.de/international/world/nato-s-eastward-expansion-did-the-west-break-its-promise-to-moscow-a-663315.html

[7]http://tinyurl.com/pqxqqjf

[8] https://fas.org/blogs/security/2015/07/ghedi-terror/

[9]One thing we can offer are these footnotes – for those of you who want to explore these issues in greater depth.

story:
Hello! My name is Bri Oglu, I am an actor/singer-songwriter who just wrote her very first film entitled SAME LOVE, a piece that touches on love, religion and the gravity of the choices that manifest when the two are combined. Your contribution will allow me to create content not just for myself, but for other talented unknown actors and crew.  


Funding

I only need 3,000 to actualize this vision! Here is the breakdown:

 1,000: Director of Photography (who has also agreed to edit!)

 1,000: Locations. I will need to rent a coffee shop and a Cathedral for three days total. The Coffee shop has already agreed to let me shoot for 500, fingers crossed that the Cathedral will be so generous ;]
500: Craft services! I want to provide my actors and crew with food and coffee to keep them fueled and to avoid hangry outbursts
500: Being an actor myself in an industry where free labor is often asked for and accepted by lesser-known professionals, I would like to be able to pay my actors and crew, even if it is merely a gas stipend.
Everyone that contributes to this film, whether 1 dollar or 1,000 dollars, will be invited to the screening and anyone who so desires will receive a hard copy of the film on me :]

Other Ways You Can Help

Share this link!

Donate snacks :]

Reach out to friends/family who may be willing to contribute.

Assist on set!

Assist with finding a Cathedral in the San Fernando Valley or Westside that will allow filming at a low cost.

story:
On September 6, 2006, my life changed. I was woken by a phone call. My dad, his voice distant and almost foreign to me, told me to simply come home. When I arrived at our family home, cars were lining both sides of the street. A lump metastasized in my throat as I walked into the house. Teary-eyed people watched me with the silence that accompanies dreadful anticipation. My dad threw his arms around me and said my brother Jeremy had been killed in action in Iraq.

Growing up, two things were certain:  I wanted to be a filmmaker, and Jeremy was my first and truest friend. Two things that had for so long seemed independent of another are now intrinsically connected. After Jeremy’s death I completed my undergraduate studies with a degree in film, and I am now finishing my master’s in screenwriting. Film is not a hobby for me but a passion. And now I find myself with the unique opportunity to share Jeremy’s story, the story of countless young men and their families.

“The Reservist” is a script I have been working on for many years. It is the story of a young soldier who, shortly after receiving word of his deployment, learns his brother has been killed in battle. Several films have attempted to capture the turmoil of modern war, but none have had the ability to be born and realized from such an intimate place.

This project is not one I take lightly, and I know I cannot do it alone. In order to hone my craft in preparation of shooting a feature I am planning to develop my skills on a series of short films. This requires the proper equipment, the right crew and a strong cast. Your contributions can provide the necessary support I need to approach these projects, putting us in position to realize “The Reservist” in the best way possible. So please, contribute what you can. If you can’t afford to donate your money, donate your share button and let others know about this project. With your help, we can honor Jeremy and all those who have made the greatest of sacrifices.

With the goal set at 20,000 dollars, I believe this is the bare minimum I will need to get proper sets/locations/costumes. The more money that's raised, the more production value that is added to the project. There's a scene at the beginning of the script that I'd like to be able to shoot in the desert, and one at the end that requires an airport. If we exceed the goal, I can afford to add those scenes in full to the script instead of scaling them back.

I want to do this right. My brother, Jeremy, deserves it to be done right, and countless families all around the country and the world deserve to have their particular story told in a modern context. 


Special thanks to Blake Burress for letting us use the trailer he cut.

story:
VERONICA ZAZUETA: DIRECTOR

I grew up in a small town in Wyoming known as Riverton. While living in Riverton I attended school at Central Wyoming College studying Radio and TV Broadcasting while interning in partnership with Wyoming PBS. I graduated with the class of 2010. For a brief moment I studied Digital Media in the state of Utah when I decide to pick up and move to Los Angeles in 2011. Once in L.A. I had many great opportunities to work on some awesome projects. While working various positions on set I was able to also intern under Joe Fineman http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0277688/?ref_=fn_al_nm_1 where I got the chance to work on (2013) Rushlights directed by Antoni Stutz, (2013) Curse of Chucky directed by Don Mancini and (2013) Don Jon directed by Joseph Gordon-Levitt. In 2015 I directed the music video Bones by Elephant Hill. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CCMwrozyE2Q 

INSTAGRAM: veronicazzz

TWITTER: https://twitter.com/VeronicaZazueta

FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/SilentJonesLadyV

THE GOAL

The goal for Silent Jones is to bring Lady-V to life in her first short film. We will be submitting to many festivals around the world including Artemis Film Festival 2016 and Sundance Film Festival 2017. In hopes to peak the interest of comic franchises such as DC and Marvel. 

PERKS

$1USD

Director Thank You Email

Your contribution from $1+ you will receive a thank you email from the director of the short film Silent Jones.


$20USD 

5x7 Sticker of Lady-V

Any contribution from $20+ will receive an 5x7 sticker of Lady-V.


$50USD

8x10 Photo of Lady-V

story_txt:
VERONICA ZAZUETA: DIRECTOR

I grew up in a small town in Wyoming known as Riverton. While living in Riverton I attended school at Central Wyoming College studying Radio and TV Broadcasting while interning in partnership with Wyoming PBS. I graduated with the class of 2010. For a brief moment I studied Digital Media in the state of Utah when I decide to pick up and move to Los Angeles in 2011. Once in L.A. I had many great opportunities to work on some awesome projects. While working various positions on set I was able to also intern under Joe Fineman http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0277688/?ref_=fn_al_nm_1 where I got the chance to work on (2013) Rushlights directed by Antoni Stutz, (2013) Curse of Chucky directed by Don Mancini and (2013) Don Jon directed by Joseph Gordon-Levitt. In 2015 I directed the music video Bones by Elephant Hill. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CCMwrozyE2Q 
INSTAGRAM: veronicazzz
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/VeronicaZazueta
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/SilentJonesLadyV
THE GOAL

The goal for Silent Jones is to bring Lady-V to life in her first short film. We will be submitting to many festivals around the world including Artemis Film Festival 2016 and Sundance Film Festival 2017. In hopes to peak the interest of comic franchises such as DC and Marvel. 


PERKS

$1USD
Director Thank You Email
Your contribution from $1+ you will receive a thank you email from the director of the short film Silent Jones.

$20USD 
5x7 Sticker of Lady-V
Any contribution from $20+ will receive an 5x7 sticker of Lady-V.

story:
The Spirit of the Age is a film and multi-platform production that will paint a vibrant picture of the Roaring Twenties at its inception. Jazz is new in the early 1920s. So is Prohibition. Women voters. Radio. Hollywood.  

We will experience the newness of the emerging modern world through the eyes of a young woman arriving at a dance –meeting young musicians, artists, dancers, bootleggers, flappers and suffragettes. The film will be supported by interactive media and a touring art exhibition that will feature building-sized exterior and gallery projections. Supporting interactive media will provide an historic background to the  film –emphasizing that the cultural, social and technological innovations and  pace of changes of the era continue to shape our world. 

We have arranged for the film's premiere and distribution through PBS station WQPT, created a non-profit association (contact us at info@thespiritoftheage.com for information about making a tax-deductible contribution) and have filmed a teaser with more than thirty crew, actors and musicians. We are poised to develop a unique production that will inspire, entertain, inform and foster critical thinking.
 

Your contribution will fund the development of this film: completion of the script, storyboard and shot list; securing a professional film crew and cast; securing legal rights; nominal pay for the creative team and others expenses such as website development and hosting.  The funds we receive above this amount will go directly towards the film's production costs. 

We will be seeking additional funding from a wide array of sources (for example, funding for the teaser was provided by a Research Council Grant from Western Illinois University). However, this does not minimize in any way our genuine need for your contributions at this point in the film’s creation. 

What will you get in return for your contribution? Perks include digital downloads, recognition for your contributions in the film and on the website, prints and posters of the artworks -even the original artworks themselves. Also the satisfaction in knowing that you were crucial in making this film possible. 

Bruce Walters, Writer and Director
Professor and artist. Walters recently created a series of videos in conjunction with the Smithsonian exhibition ”NASA | 50 Years of Exploration” that were projected across the entire width of the Figge Art Museum and displayed prominently at the State Historical Museum, Des Moines, and the Contemporary Art Center of Peoria. Other recent work has been included in exhibitions and presentations at the Russian Cultural Center in Memphis, TN; Tate Modern, London; Uster Festival of Art & Design, Belfast; and the Geddes Institute for Urban Research, University of Dundee, Scotland.


J. Douglas Miller, Collaborator and Producer
Founder, Motion Pictures Midwest.  Field producer for SUGAR, a Sundance Film Festival Grand Prize nominee (2008), winner, National Board of Review Top Independent Film Award (2009) and AFI Movie of the Year Award (2010). And for The Mississippi: River of Song, a five part, Smithsonian multimedia series for the PBS Network; production director for six Aurelio De Laurentiis and Pupi Avati films - Cannes (1991) and Venice (1992) Film Festival nominations and multi award winners.  In addition, Miller has worked, coordinated, promoted and/or produced various projects with such entertainment figures as Cary Grant, Bob Hope, Milton Berle, Lauren Bacall, Burl Ives, Pearl Bailey, Louis Bellson, Harry Belafonte, Hogie Carmichael Jr., Arthur Fiedler, Ella Fitzgerald, Dizzie Gillespie, Ramsey Lewis, Wynton Marsalis, Leon Russell and Lalo Schifrin. 


James Schmedding, Interactive Designer
Professional experience in user interface design, web development, management and marketing as well as in 3D animation and modeling.  


Additional creative team contributors:

Dr. John Cooper, professor and jazz artist and composer who performs with his quartet, with the Johnny Trudell Orchestra, with jazz artists -including Jon Faddis, Carl Fontana, Jim McNeely, Clark Terry, John Fedchock, David Liebman, Gary Foster, Alan Vizutti, James Moody, J. C. Heard, Duffy Jackson, Chico O'Ferrill, Jiggs Wigham Terry Gibbs, Slide Hampton, Ken Watters, and other national touring acts -including Aretha Franklin, Rosemary Clooney, Jerry Lewis, The Temptations, The Nelson Riddle Orchestra, Martha Reeves and the Vandellas, and Lou Rawls.

Dr. Hoyet H. Hemphill, interactivity coordinator, Professor who has an extensive publishing and presentation record in technology, psychology and cross-cultural study.

Dr. John Hallwas, Distinguished Professor Emeritus and author of The Bootlegger: A Story of Small-Town America and other award-winning historical books on the American Midwest. 

Dr. Sherry Lindquist, assistant-professor who has research interests and publications on the social history of art and cultural exchange. 


The risks and challenges of this project will be mitigated in large part by the creative team's decades of professional experience. For example, J. Douglas Miller has served as a producer for films featured at the Cannes and Sundance festivals and for a PBS mini-series.  We will contract with professional filmmakers and media legal consultants to ensure that that outcome will be of the highest caliber and to minimize potential problems. We are planning thoroughly – developing alternative plans for every contingency we may face. 


Let the world know about our film!! Please - use the email, embed, link and follow buttons on the side to spread the word. You will be helping us tremendously. 

Join us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/spirit.film. 

We can't thank you enough for your support!

story:
Who are we?

Active Actors is a Social Network and Hub of Actors, Agencies, Filmmakers and Community Collaborations: an all-ages and from every creed non-profit group of actors who are indeed active!

For Hollywood by Hollywood and open to mentor across the states and beyond borders; In the country where dreams really do come true.

It is a weekly service to actors who seek to receive or give back and maintain their chops in the world of acting a scene, auditioning for the jobs, preparing for the jobs and collaborating to keep creating new ideas. 

The Start-up was in the heart of Hollywood California and soon was carried on to Texas as well as New York by fervent Active Actors Lead volunteers. It was for a long time at the Hollywood Youth Center where gangs infested the youth prior to the efforts of the city to upgrade the neighborhood's self image and activities. It carried on at a near by park for years, every weekend, at the Veteran's Hospital with the Salvation Army. 

It is a humble grass-root and word of mouth effort however very respected in the Film Industry on the employers side and with the amazing mentoring of some of the most notable executives of the Industry in Studios or Agencies. 
The newly appointed President of Active Actors is Rising Star Andrew Jacobs who received his training at Active Actors since his acting beginnings in childhood who received the distinction of being chosen by Paramount as the Lead of the new Paranormal Activities - The Marked Ones.

Previous President and Co-founder Rabbi Mark Sobel is himself a SAG-AFTRA actor known for acting as himself in the Finale of E.R and Weeds who stated back in the beginning "There is a poetic justice to this organization reaching for the empowerment of Actors and Filmmakers together serving the community of all ages and creeds, since Jewish Entrepreneurs practically started this Industry". 
Under the current new Board of Directors with Ross M Johnson, Active Actors is rising to new heights, beyond the consistent training on camera, inviting new creative collaborations in the supports of Actors, Productions, Webisodes, Shorts, Films, Scripts writing, Festivals or Screenings and every new media forms of fan base building. 

Active Actors is a volunteer and mentoring base organization, and solidifying relationships with Parks and Recreations, Volunteer Center of LA, Community Police Advisory Board and soon joining the LA Film Committee of the City of LA.

What We Need & What You Get

After years of growth we are badly in need of a new space. We desire to expand in a new location to offer better educational conditions and resources. With your tax deductible contribution we can grow to offer more to our community.

Our goal will pay for 6 months rent and construction of the interior of a new rental space in the greater Los Angeles area. We have several locations in mind within our set goal and should it go beyond where we will be able to offer more.

Rather than spend our budget on merchandise you may not want, we are offering a selection of local Perks. Select for yourself or for friends! Plus as a registered Non-Profit all contributions will be tax deductible!

The Impact

Below is our ideal floor layout to be constructed. We've broken it down into three tiers depending on budget.

  • Tier 1 Class Rooms (Red) - Room A for Children. Room B for Beginner's, and Room C for Mixed level intermediate & S.A.G
  • Tier 2 Production House ( Green) - We construct storage, makeup, sound, editing, and green screen rooms to be used for productions and classes. 
  • Tier 3  Multi-Purpose Rooms (Blue) - We construct various rooms for personal, students, and for those that wish to rent the facilities.

With our new expanded environment Active Actors will continue to offer free and affordable classes to children and adults, industry mentoring, preparation for roles (including: reels, headshots), collaborations, networking, improv exercises (Vine, social media comedy), audition exercises, scene study and contemporary script work, Shakespeare for the camera. Including monthly activities: New Media productions, learning to work with the Actors Union (SAG-AFTRA), Community Talent Showcase (Cafe Hollywood), and now affordable in-house productions. 

Risks & Challenges

Established in 2011 Active Actors is a seasoned non-profit passionately skilled at working within budgets. No matter the result of this campaign it will make a difference and further our mission of giving to our community.

This is no risk by supporting our campaign, we are established, and we are tax deductible!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot give at the moment and our Perks do not suit your fancy please share our campaign on your social media and to all that you feel would be interested in our cause. If you are local to Los Angeles and know of an excellent place/opportunity for us to promote the campaign please contact us!

story:
Efecto Cocuyo/ Periodismo que ilumina 

Campaña 

Apoya a Efecto Cocuyo, periodismo independiente

An English message follows below.

Todos sabemos que en Venezuela están desapareciendo los espacios para el periodismo independiente. Los periodistas han sido blanco de intimidación y agresión. La compra sistemática de medios de comunicación tradicionales han ido callando las voces disidentes.

Hoy, conseguir información confiable sobre lo que pasa en Venezuela es más difícil que nunca. Enfrentamos un proceso de desinformación sistemática. Este uno de los momentos de mayor oscuridad para los periodistas independientes en Venezuela.

Está claro que las viejas formas de financiar al periodismo de calidad en Venezuela han fracasado. Llegó el momento de innovar.

EFECTO COCUYO acepta ese reto. Ofrecemos un espacio para el periodismo libre, profesional, investigativo, sin estridencias ni guabineos.

Somos periodistas. Estamos dispuestos a asumir el riesgo de emprender una plataforma de información e investigación independiente, sin partidos políticos o poderes económicos que nos avalen.

EFECTO COCUYO busca tornar un momento de oscuridad es un momento de luz en Venezuela. Sabemos que periodismo libre es una causa, por la cual vale la pena luchar.

EFECTO COCUYO es un espacio para el periodismo que ilumina, una plataforma transmedia para el monitoreo de noticias y la investigación seria.

Nos proponemos redescubrir valores básicos que se han ido perdiendo: investigar, escudriñar, cuestionar y siempre, siempre verificar antes de publicar.

Creemos en los usuarios conscientes como parte fundamental del ejercicio periodístico. El respeto y la interacción con nuestros lectores serán un eje transversal de nuestro periodismo.

Contribuye con nosotros y llevaremos la innovación más allá.

EL EQUIPO:

Nuestra directora, Luz Mely Reyes, es una veterana de mil batallas periodística. Ex directora del diario 2001, ex jefa de la Unidad de Investigación del diario Últimas Noticias, Luz Mely ganó el Victoria Awards en 2014. Ha develado hechos de corrupción en casos como el Proyecto Irán-Venezuela y el secuestro de Rodrigo Granda. Ha sido editora de coberturas electorales como TuVoto2012. Por su activa participación en defensa del periodismo, especialmente cuando en 2013 fue citada por la Fiscalía a declarar por un titular de la primera página del diario 2001.

Nuestra Jefa Editora, Laura Weffer,  ha sido parte de los equipos de periodismo de investigación más importantes de medios impresos en Venezuela. Laura ha ganado dos veces el Premio Instituto Prensa y Sociedad, la primera vez en 2006 y una vez más en 2014. Ha ganado tambien el premio de cobertura Gabriel García Márquez, y una mención especial a su trayectoria, por parte del premio Maria Moors Cabot de la universidad de Columbia, en reconocimiento a sus trabajos, las distorsiones de la investigación asesinato del fiscal Danilo Anderson y el asesinato de Basil Dacosta.

FINANCIA AL PERIODISMO INDEPENDIENTE  

Sabemos que hay muchísimos Venezolanos en el exterior profundamente angustiados por la situación del país que están buscando una forma concreta para colaborar para preservar espacios de libertad en nuestro país.

Con tu aporte podremos cumplir con nuestro papel de mantenerte informado. Nuestra estrategia de Crowdsourcing – microfinanciamiento – garantiza nuestra independencia editorial y la continuidad de nuestro ejercicio. Pero solo lo podemos lograr con tu ayuda.

No dependeremos de clicks en muchachas en tanga ni de anunciantes manipulables políticamente. Dependeremos de ti.

DESTINO DE LOS RECURSOS:

I: 15K $ sustento anual para la plataforma y equipo base

II: 15K $ expansión nacional e internacional de Red Cocuyo, periodistas y activistas del III: independiente, asignación de investigaciones en estados remotos, sectores fronterizos  

III: 10K $  generación de redes de denuncia, información, expansión a comunidades y sectores populares

IV: 10K $  Cobertura especial de las elecciones Asamblea Nacional Venezuela 2015

V: 15K $  proyecto piloto de periodismo de data

VI: 10K $ escuela de verano para jóvenes periodistas

VII: 5K $ generación de aplicaciones independientes

Comparte el sueño, hagámoslo realidad

•••

THE PROBLEM

Venezuela’s media landscape has changed sharply over the last two years. Private media that once challenged the government and exposed corruption have watered down their coverage in the wake of secretive changes in ownership. Imagine if 60 Minutes, instead of making public officials and corporate moguls squirm on camera, began airing softball interviews that cautiously ducked controversies. Or if dozens of critics of Barack Obama were suddenly dropped from the Op-Ed pages of The Washington Post or the New York Times. This is the reality that Venezuela’s news consumers face today. Hundreds of reporters unwilling to work under such conditions have quit their jobs in search of new opportunities. This is one of the darkest moments in Venezuela related to free journalism practice.

WHAT WE OFFER

Efecto Cocuyo is an independent Venezuelan media platform that delivers critical reporting and hard-hitting investigations in an era of media complacence and growing limitations on citizens’ ability to stay informed. Our team combines the energy of young writers with the experience of award-winning veteran journalists to cover stories that are increasingly being ignored by corporate media. These include the growing challenges for Venezuelans to obtain basic goods, the growth of poverty after more than a decade of prosperity, and the elusive search for justice by relatives of 43 people killed during opposition demonstrations in 2014.

We've set out to run a community-driven newsroom that *seamlessly* integrates social networks into the reporting process by using our Twitter and Facebook communities to generate story ideas and keep us up to date on breaking news. This structure is the inspiration for our name, Efecto Cocuyo, which in Spanish means “Firefly Effect.” Our platform is the product of millions of tiny sparks, which together can illuminate an entire nation. Our strength-in-numbers approach is also reflected in our reliance on crowd funding as a means of financing. Using platforms like IndieGoGo helps ensure that we are not beholden to economic interests.

Efecto Cocuyo is committed to holding powerful public officials accountable in a system that increasingly protects them from public scrutiny. We are equally committed to criticizing opposition leaders who have repeatedly set back our country’s democracy over the years through maneuvers including a 2002 coup, an oil-industry shutdown, and a boycott of parliamentary elections.

THE TEAM

Our founders are two such reporters. Luz Mely Reyes is a relentless investigator who has broken news on Venezuela’s cooperation with Iran and the activities of Colombian guerillas in the country. In 2013  she was arraigned by state prosecutors after President Nicolas Maduro lashed out at a story about gasoline shortages published by daily newspaper 2001 where she was worked as Editor in Chief until she decided to start Efecto Cocuyo

Laura Weffer, who in 2014 led an investigation of murders by rogue intelligence officers that paved the way for arrests of security officials, left the country’s best-selling newspaper Ultimas Noticias after realizing this sort of work was no longer welcome there.

.In 2014 Luz Mely received the Victory Award for excellency in political journalism and Laura has twice won the IPYS Prize for investigative journalism, as well the Gabriel Garcia Maquez Award for best coverage in 2014 and the Maria Moors Cabot Prize recognition for live achievement.  

INVEST IN INDEPENDENT JOURNALISM

Today Venezuelan journalists committed with their role require the support from citizens from different latitudes in order to preserve the right of Venezuelan citizens to be informed about public issues which are being censored.

Efecto Cocuyo relies on individual donations to maintain our operations, but we need funding for special projects. This year’s parliamentary elections will be the first since private media began tacitly siding with the government. We want to hire reporters to provide post breaking news analysis, investigative report and comprehensive content about crucial information. We also want to build a data-reporting investigations team that can uncover corruption by state officials. And we are planning to hold a series of workshops for young reporters with a focus on the provinces, where the country’s economic crisis is being felt the most.

RESOURCES ASSIGNMENT:

I: 15K $ will be the annual sustenance for the platform and the base team

II: 15K $ will expand our Cocuyo Network at national and international frame, in order to assign investigative reports in remote and border states. Not only it will be a network for journalists but activists and supporting citizens also

III: 10K $ will boost an information/complaint community network, and we will envision new ways to reach vulnerable audiences

IV: 10K $ will sustain the special coverage of the National Assembly elections for 2015 in Venezuela

V: 15K $ will thrust a pilot scheme in data journalism

VI: 10K $ will funs the summer school for young journalists

VII: 5K $ for experimentation and generation of informative apps

Share the dream, let`s make it real

•••

Interactúa con nosotros/Come see our Beta Site:

www.efectococuyo.com

Twitter @EfectoCocuyo

Facebook

story_txt:
Efecto Cocuyo/ Periodismo que ilumina 
Campaña 
Apoya a Efecto Cocuyo, periodismo independiente

An English message follows below.Todos sabemos que en Venezuela están desapareciendo los espacios para el periodismo independiente. Los periodistas han sido blanco de intimidación y agresión. La compra sistemática de medios de comunicación tradicionales han ido callando las voces disidentes.Hoy, conseguir información confiable sobre lo que pasa en Venezuela es más difícil que nunca. Enfrentamos un proceso de desinformación sistemática. Este uno de los momentos de mayor oscuridad para los periodistas independientes en Venezuela.Está claro que las viejas formas de financiar al periodismo de calidad en Venezuela han fracasado. Llegó el momento de innovar.EFECTO COCUYO acepta ese reto. Ofrecemos un espacio para el periodismo libre, profesional, investigativo, sin estridencias ni guabineos. Somos periodistas. Estamos dispuestos a asumir el riesgo de emprender una plataforma de información e investigación independiente, sin partidos políticos o poderes económicos que nos avalen.EFECTO COCUYO busca tornar un momento de oscuridad es un momento de luz en Venezuela. Sabemos que periodismo libre es una causa, por la cual vale la pena luchar.EFECTO COCUYO es un espacio para el periodismo que ilumina, una plataforma transmedia para el monitoreo de noticias y la investigación seria.Nos proponemos redescubrir valores básicos que se han ido perdiendo: investigar, escudriñar, cuestionar y siempre, siempre verificar antes de publicar.Creemos en los usuarios conscientes como parte fundamental del ejercicio periodístico. El respeto y la interacción con nuestros lectores serán un eje transversal de nuestro periodismo.Contribuye con nosotros y llevaremos la innovación más allá.EL EQUIPO:Nuestra directora, Luz Mely Reyes, es una veterana de mil batallas periodística. Ex directora del diario 2001, ex jefa de la Unidad de Investigación del diario Últimas Noticias, Luz Mely ganó el Victoria Awards en 2014. Ha develado hechos de corrupción en casos como el Proyecto Irán-Venezuela y el secuestro de Rodrigo Granda. Ha sido editora de coberturas electorales como TuVoto2012. Por su activa participación en defensa del periodismo, especialmente cuando en 2013 fue citada por la Fiscalía a declarar por un titular de la primera página del diario 2001.Nuestra Jefa Editora, Laura Weffer,  ha sido parte de los equipos de periodismo de investigación más importantes de medios impresos en Venezuela. Laura ha ganado dos veces el Premio Instituto Prensa y Sociedad, la primera vez en 2006 y una vez más en 2014. Ha ganado tambien el premio de cobertura Gabriel García Márquez, y una mención especial a su trayectoria, por parte del premio Maria Moors Cabot de la universidad de Columbia, en reconocimiento a sus trabajos, las distorsiones de la investigación asesinato del fiscal Danilo Anderson y el asesinato de Basil Dacosta.FINANCIA AL PERIODISMO INDEPENDIENTE  Sabemos que hay muchísimos Venezolanos en el exterior profundamente angustiados por la situación del país que están buscando una forma concreta para colaborar para preservar espacios de libertad en nuestro país.Con tu aporte podremos cumplir con nuestro papel de mantenerte informado. Nuestra estrategia de Crowdsourcing – microfinanciamiento – garantiza nuestra independencia editorial y la continuidad de nuestro ejercicio. Pero solo lo podemos lograr con tu ayuda.No dependeremos de clicks en muchachas en tanga ni de anunciantes manipulables políticamente. Dependeremos de ti.DESTINO DE LOS RECURSOS:I: 15K $ sustento anual para la plataforma y equipo baseII: 15K $ expansión nacional e internacional de Red Cocuyo, periodistas y activistas del III: independiente, asignación de investigaciones en estados remotos, sectores fronterizos  III: 10K $  generación de redes de denuncia, información, expansión a comunidades y sectores popularesIV: 10K $  Cobertura especial de las elecciones Asamblea Nacional Venezuela 2015V: 15K $  proyecto piloto de periodismo de dataVI: 10K $ escuela de verano para jóvenes periodistasVII: 5K $ generación de aplicaciones independientesComparte el sueño, hagámoslo realidad•••THE PROBLEMVenezuela’s media landscape has changed sharply over the last two years. Private media that once challenged the government and exposed corruption have watered down their coverage in the wake of secretive changes in ownership. Imagine if 60 Minutes, instead of making public officials and corporate moguls squirm on camera, began airing softball interviews that cautiously ducked controversies. Or if dozens of critics of Barack Obama were suddenly dropped from the Op-Ed pages of The Washington Post or the New York Times. This is the reality that Venezuela’s news consumers face today. Hundreds of reporters unwilling to work under such conditions have quit their jobs in search of new opportunities. This is one of the darkest moments in Venezuela related to free journalism practice.WHAT WE OFFEREfecto Cocuyo is an independent Venezuelan media platform that delivers critical reporting and hard-hitting investigations in an era of media complacence and growing limitations on citizens’ ability to stay informed. Our team combines the energy of young writers with the experience of award-winning veteran journalists to cover stories that are increasingly being ignored by corporate media. These include the growing challenges for Venezuelans to obtain basic goods, the growth of poverty after more than a decade of prosperity, and the elusive search for justice by relatives of 43 people killed during opposition demonstrations in 2014.We've set out to run a community-driven newsroom that *seamlessly* integrates social networks into the reporting process by using our Twitter and Facebook communities to generate story ideas and keep us up to date on breaking news. This structure is the inspiration for our name, Efecto Cocuyo, which in Spanish means “Firefly Effect.” Our platform is the product of millions of tiny sparks, which together can illuminate an entire nation. Our strength-in-numbers approach is also reflected in our reliance on crowd funding as a means of financing. Using platforms like IndieGoGo helps ensure that we are not beholden to economic interests.Efecto Cocuyo is committed to holding powerful public officials accountable in a system that increasingly protects them from public scrutiny. We are equally committed to criticizing opposition leaders who have repeatedly set back our country’s democracy over the years through maneuvers including a 2002 coup, an oil-industry shutdown, and a boycott of parliamentary elections.THE TEAMOur founders are two such reporters. Luz Mely Reyes is a relentless investigator who has broken news on Venezuela’s cooperation with Iran and the activities of Colombian guerillas in the country. In 2013  she was arraigned by state prosecutors after President Nicolas Maduro lashed out at a story about gasoline shortages published by daily newspaper 2001 where she was worked as Editor in Chief until she decided to start Efecto CocuyoLaura Weffer, who in 2014 led an investigation of murders by rogue intelligence officers that paved the way for arrests of security officials, left the country’s best-selling newspaper Ultimas Noticias after realizing this sort of work was no longer welcome there..In 2014 Luz Mely received the Victory Award for excellency in political journalism and Laura has twice won the IPYS Prize for investigative journalism, as well the Gabriel Garcia Maquez Award for best coverage in 2014 and the Maria Moors Cabot Prize recognition for live achievement.  INVEST IN INDEPENDENT JOURNALISMToday Venezuelan journalists committed with their role require the support from citizens from different latitudes in order to preserve the right of Venezuelan citizens to be informed about public issues which are being censored.Efecto Cocuyo relies on individual donations to maintain our operations, but we need funding for special projects. This year’s parliamentary elections will be the first since private media began tacitly siding with the government. We want to hire reporters to provide post breaking news analysis, investigative report and comprehensive content about crucial information. We also want to build a data-reporting investigations team that can uncover corruption by state officials. And we are planning to hold a series of workshops for young reporters with a focus on the provinces, where the country’s economic crisis is being felt the most.RESOURCES ASSIGNMENT:I: 15K $ will be the annual sustenance for the platform and the base teamII: 15K $ will expand our Cocuyo Network at national and international frame, in order to assign investigative reports in remote and border states. Not only it will be a network for journalists but activists and supporting citizens alsoIII: 10K $ will boost an information/complaint community network, and we will envision new ways to reach vulnerable audiencesIV: 10K $ will sustain the special coverage of the National Assembly elections for 2015 in VenezuelaV: 15K $ will thrust a pilot scheme in data journalismVI: 10K $ will funs the summer school for young journalistsVII: 5K $ for experimentation and generation of informative appsShare the dream, let`s make it real•••Interactúa con nosotros/Come see our Beta Site:www.efectococuyo.comTwitter @EfectoCocuyoFacebookYoutubeWhassap +584123209349 / +584143080907

story:
A NEW PERK HAS BEEN ADDED!

Land an IMDb-credited "walk-on" role in the upcoming feature KILL ME ONCE, starring Andrew Bongiorno and Rachel Alig. Production on this supernatural thriller is scheduled for September, 2015, in San Diego . Only four (4) are available and you must be at least 18 years of age. For more information, check out the official KILL ME ONCE Facebook page.
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Kill-Me-Once/1465916927022855

What is ABERRANT about?

At the onset of a rapidly-moving global pandemic in which dead people are returning as flesh-eating abominations that can infect the living with a single bite, Brad and Leslie take shelter in a semi-isolated house believed to be uninhabited. But their safe haven turns into a death trap when they encounter Nicoleta—a renegade female vampire that has also taken refuge in the house.

What could possibly go wrong there?

ABERRANT TEASER


What do you plan on doing with it once it's completed?

As is the case with most horror shorts, it will be submitted to genre specific festivals all over the World.

What’s the money for?

Wanting to produce this film at the highest quality possible, we plan on shooting at 4k with a Red Scarlet. With a small cast, only two locations, and a relatively small crew, we're confident that we can produce a first rate film with the amount we're seeking. Your generous contributions will allow us to cover all production expenses, including cast & crew, equipment rental, insurance, location fees and permits, hair & make-up/SFX, catering, and post-production expenses, which include editing, original music score, color grading, VFX, and sound design.

What happens if we don't reach our goal?

We opted for a "flexible funding" campaign, which means that we'll receive all funds pledged (minus IndieGoGo & Paypal fees). Rest assured that one way or another, this film will be produced and all contributors will receive their perks as promised.

What happens if we raise more than our goal?

The amount we are seeking is the bare minimum we need to shoot the film. Any surplus funds will go toward the hiring of additional crew members and/or possibly adding one more day to our shooting schedule.

When will I receive my rewards?

IMDb credits will be almost immediate. Others will be fulfilled once the film is completed and we're ready to submit to festivals. (Please note that DVD copies of "Aberrant" & "Ghostline" won't be shipped until we've completed our festival run).

Can I do anything else to help?

Absolutely!  You can spread the word by emailing this page link to friends and family and by posting it on Facebook and Twitter. Our goal is to create a buzz.

Who's in the cast?

DANIELLE LOZEAU

We feel very fortunate to have landed Danielle for the lead female role of 'Leslie'. Danielle's career has blossomed significantly over the past four years in both TV and film, including roles in the FOX hit TV series "Terminator: Sarah Connor Chronicles" and the Blockbuster hit "Legion". Since 2013, she's either starred or appeared in seven feature films, including "The Black Water Vampire" and "Werewolf Rising" (both featuring horror icon Bill Oberst, Jr.). Upcoming projects included "Broken Memories" with Ivan Sergei ("Fatal Instinct"), and "Twinge" with Kane Hodder ("Hatchet").

http://www.imdb.com/name/nm1699451/

MIKE BRAYDEN

For the lead male role of 'Brad', we selected MIKE BRAYDEN, a San Diego actor who's been quietly making a name for himself over the past two years. He is best known for "A Good Ol' Chap", for which he won a 'Best Actor' award for his portrayal of a Charlie Chaplin-type character. He also played the role of the demon in "Soul Insurance", an official selection of the Oceanside International Film Festival and the Atlanta Horror Film Festival. Mike is set to make his feature film debut as 'Ray Niles' in Dean Whitney's upcoming feature, "Kill Me Once".

http://www.imdb.com/name/nm4932687/

NADIA LANFRANCONI

Nadia was born and raised in Lake Como, Italy. After living in Milan for a couple of years, she moved to LA at the beginning of 2007 to record an album as a singer/songwriter. Since then, she's been working regularly in the entertainment industry as a model/host/actress and musician. Her most recent films are "The Snow Queen" and "Blue Dream" (James Duvall & Dominique Swain). Upcoming feature films include "Unbelieveable!!!!!" (Dina Meyer, Olivia d'Abo, Michael Madsen, & Julie Warner), "The Road Home" (Lily Tomlin & Kelly Overton), and "Mesopotania" (Bill Oberst, Jr., Angela Kerecz, & Devanny Pinn).

http://www.imdb.com/name/nm3444377/

MARK ANTHONY COX

Mark Anthony Cox is a veteran actor who spent the 90’s rubbing shoulders with some of Hollywood’s finest and has several film and episodic TV credits. Born in Mexico City and raised in San Diego, he started his career by booking his first ever audition in 1993—a national commercial with Sally Struthers. He’s been represented by the Shamon Frietas Talent Agency ever since. Following a brief hiatus during which he and his high school sweetheart and wife, Tami, raised their three children, Mark re-entered the local film community with a big splash. Since August 2014 he's appeared in over 15 short films, webisodes, PSAs & commercials, and has been cast in three upcoming feature films and several more shorts that are scheduled for production in the Spring and Summer of 2015. 

http://www.imdb.com/name/nm1028773/

About the Producer

Mark Benjamin was born in Chicago, Illinois and attended Northern Illinois University where he studied theatre arts. He subsequently returned to Chicago honing his improvisation skills at The Second City Training Center upon graduation. In 1980 Mark moved to San Diego, California, where he began his acting career in 1985 appearing in the CBS mini-series “SPACE”. He gained his Master's Degree at USC shortly thereafter while continuing to build his acting skills. Mark most recently appeared in the feature films "Ghostline", "Carving a Life", and "Blacklisted". He is scheduled to appear in the feature films "Kill Me Once", “Perpetual Nexus", and the television sitcom "KOH" this coming year. Mark has also appeared in the ABC Drama series "Scandal", the Discovery Channel Show "Headlines", Lifetime Channel's "Deadly Wives", and The REELZ Channel show "Treasure King".

http://www.imdb.com/name/nm4546223/

About the Director

Producer/Director/Screenwriter Dean Whitney has been a busy man over the past few years and he doesn't plan on slowing down anytime soon. Following his successful directorial debut with the award-winning short film "The Body Bag" in 2012, he wrote, produced, and directed his first feature film, "Ghostline", in 2014. Although "Ghostline" won't officially be released until later this year, it has already won key awards from the FANtastic Horror Film FF (Best of the Fest), the California Film Awards (Silver Award), and the Florida Horror FF (Best Visual FX Feature). His next feature, "Kill Me Once", goes into production this summer.

GHOSTLINE trailer (watch in HD):


http://www.imdb.me/deanwhitney

Locations have been secured and principal photography is scheduled for April 2 - 4 in Crest, California. 


How can I learn more?

If you have any questions, please send a message to us directly by clicking the “Contact me” link at the top right of this page or the blue "Ask A Question" button down below.  We'll gladly answer any questions we can.

Risks & Challenges

Our only real challenge is to make a high quality film that everyone involved will be proud of.  But we are more than up for the task. The only risk we face is that since the entire story takes place at remote locations at night, there's always a chance of us running into some REAL zombies or vampires (wink wink).

story:
Do you honor and respect the sacrifices of Queen Harriet Tubman? Support the Chosen: Queen Moses Movement!


Do you feel the shift in the air? People all over the world are tired of the system and many are rebelling because they realize that they are not truly free. They are tired of living beneath their potential and are ready to move forward and be the best that they can be. Is that You? Well, if so, it sounds like you have a little bit of Harriet Tubman running through your veins. Like you, she dealt with oppression as long as she was able to and then one day she had gotten tired of it all and decided that the only way her life would change was if she rose up, walked away from everything that didn't represent her true nature and changed it into what she wanted for herself.

Freedom and Purpose are undeniably two important things that many people around the world don't have. Our great Ancestor, Queen Harriet, successfully navigated through this world with all odds against her and managed to figure out the secret to obtaining both! So I, Saacha Spade, believe that NOW is the time to reveal those secrets to the masses and what better way to share them then to tell her story? That's right, FINALLY Queen Harriet Tubman's full life story is about to be told through a 6 hour miniseries for television and YOU have the opportunity to contribute to her project! 

I don't know about you, but I believe that if we don't tell our stories, someone else will and more than likely, they won't tell them right. I often hear people complain about the type of entertainment that our children our exposed to, but when it is time to do something about it, many refuse to support people who are actually doing something to change it. Have you saw a project through the television or movie screen about our legendary Heroine, Harriet Tubman, during your life time? If you have, did it memorialize her on the level that she deserves? Well, personally I don't complain about what I am not willing to change, so instead of finding something negative to say about the movies that are being produced about our story, I decided to move forward and make sure that her story was told.

 I began working on a book about her life in March of 2014 because I wanted to bring a relevant feel to her story that would help us identify with who she is in this era.  Almost 2 years later, not only have I written a novel about her but I have also written a screenplay that is moving into production in May of 2015 and additionally have developed some absolutely phenomenal products that will engage the minds of the youngest to the most mature and display the relevance of her life.  I am dedicated and committed to making sure that her name is known all over the world because she deserves all of the honor and tribute that we can give to her! This is why I am reaching out to partner with you because I'm sure you love her too and know that she has not been honored the way that she truly deserves to be. Many of the children and teenagers have no idea who she truly is or what she did to help all of us, so it is my personal objective to make sure that I do everything I can to from here on out that will help people identify with her as Queen Moses.

The Descendants Of Harriet Tubman are aware of this project and support the story that I wrote as a proper and honorable representation of their Ancestor. I am extremely grateful and humbled to have their support and cooperation with bringing Queen Harriet's story to life for all to see and if you recognize the gravity of who she is, you should know that her Descendants take her life seriously. Her full story has never been told through the entertainment industry and although people have taken her legacy and disrespected her through what was supposed to be comedy, this project will make sure that she is revered the way that she deserves to be. The Matriarchs of the family are especially my concern because they have not had the peace to know that an appropriate depiction of her life story has been told to the masses, so please consider them as well when giving your contribution. It is my objective to bring her story to life in a manner that will satisfy the Matriarchs of the family and allow them to have assurance that her life and legacy are represented properly as well as get the project done while they are still with us to enjoy it. 

With all that is being done for Queen Harriet through this project, we are opening the door for you to help us! There is a lot to do and we are working extremely hard setting the stage for her to be properly memorialized today! Your participation in giving and sharing the word about the project is showing your honor to her! I am   VERY thankful for the option to use crowd funding through Indiegogo, because it is an awesome service that allows us as a community the ability to partner on projects that are of importance to us and get it done! I do not want to be at the mercy of trying to convince someone in the entertainment industry as to why her story is worth telling. There is a MAJOR demand for her story and this demand has not been recognized since 1978 when Queen Cicely Tyson represented her in "A Woman Called Moses". 

Also, if we were not crowd funding through Indiegogo and this project was taken on by a major production company, I could very well lose the creative control over the story line. That would mean that scenes, characters and other very important information would be cut out from the story when I feel they deserve and need to be there.  So, Indiegogo has given us the ability to reach out to you, share our vision, and use 100% of the money that is raised by this campaign towards making her story the best that it can possibly be. This is why we’re here on Indiegogo with this campaign!

Donations or not, we realize that a lot of people may not be in the position to freely give without receiving anything so we don't want to come across as if we want something for nothing because we don't! So we decided to show you how grateful we are for your contribution by returning a perk to you as a thank you for believing in the movement. Queen Harriet's life has had an impact on all of us regardless of race, culture, sex or age and we will ALL benefit from her story being told, not just a particular group of people. So as a contributor, you will be gifted with promotional gifts which are absolutely phenomenal and they will remind you how important Freedom and Purpose are to your success! We absolutely love that you are supporting our Ancestor.

  PLEASE NOTE: PERK FULFILLMENT WILL BEGIN ONCE CAMPAIGN IS OVER

           Take a look at the wonderful gifts we give to our Contributors!

Queen Harriet is the ultimate example of someone who took control over her own destiny and freed herself from an environment that was structured to hold her down! We would love to have your support and see you wearing one of our promotional items to spread the message of FREEDOM! Help us honor Queen Moses and give your support today! Don't delay! NO AMOUNT IS TOO SMALL! 

Other Ways You Can Help

We know everyone can not give monetarily, however everyone can give something. Although we wish that you could help us monetarily, don't let that be the reason that you don't help at all. A few ways that you can help us is to: 

  • Spread the word about our campaign!
  • Ask your friends and family to make noise about what we are doing!
  • Come back and give when you have the ability to!
  • Keep sending us positive energy and prayers through our project!
  • If you would like to volunteer to assist us in some way, send us a message!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you so much for supporting us and for loving Queen Harriet! We are excited about our project and pray that we all continue to pursue our freedom like she did by any means necessary!

"I had reasoned this out in my mind, there was one of two things I had a right to, liberty or death; If I couldn't have one, I would have the other."

- Harriet Tubman
story_txt:
Do you honor and respect the sacrifices of Queen Harriet Tubman? Support the Chosen: Queen Moses Movement! 


Do you feel the shift in the air? People all over the world are tired of the system and many are rebelling because they realize that they are not truly free. They are tired of living beneath their potential and are ready to move forward and be the best that they can be. Is that You? Well, if so, it sounds like you have a little bit of Harriet Tubman running through your veins. Like you, she dealt with oppression as long as she was able to and then one day she had gotten tired of it all and decided that the only way her life would change was if she rose up, walked away from everything that didn't represent her true nature and changed it into what she wanted for herself. 
Freedom and Purpose are undeniably two important things that many people around the world don't have. Our great Ancestor, Queen Harriet, successfully navigated through this world with all odds against her and managed to figure out the secret to obtaining both! So I, Saacha Spade, believe that NOW is the time to reveal those secrets to the masses and what better way to share them then to tell her story? That's right, FINALLY Queen Harriet Tubman's full life story is about to be told through a 6 hour miniseries for television and YOU have the opportunity to contribute to her project! 

I don't know about you, but I believe that if we don't tell our stories, someone else will and more than likely, they won't tell them right. I often hear people complain about the type of entertainment that our children our exposed to, but when it is time to do something about it, many refuse to support people who are actually doing something to change it. Have you saw a project through the television or movie screen about our legendary Heroine, Harriet Tubman, during your life time? If you have, did it memorialize her on the level that she deserves? Well, personally I don't complain about what I am not willing to change, so instead of finding something negative to say about the movies that are being produced about our story, I decided to move forward and make sure that her story was told. 

 I began working on a book about her life in March of 2014 because I wanted to bring a relevant feel to her story that would help us identify with who she is in this era.  Almost 2 years later, not only have I written a novel about her but I have also written a screenplay that is moving into production in May of 2015 and additionally have developed some absolutely phenomenal products that will engage the minds of the youngest to the most mature and display the relevance of her life.  I am dedicated and committed to making sure that her name is known all over the world because she deserves all of the honor and tribute that we can give to her! This is why I am reaching out to partner with you because I'm sure you love her too and know that she has not been honored the way that she truly deserves to be. Many of the children and teenagers have no idea who she truly is or what she did to help all of us, so it is my personal objective to make sure that I do everything I can to from here on out that will help people identify with her as Queen Moses.


The
 Descendants Of Harriet Tubman are aware of this project and support the
 story that I wrote as a proper and honorable representation of their 
Ancestor. I am extremely grateful and humbled to have their support and 
cooperation with bringing Queen Harriet's story to life for all to see and if you recognize the gravity of who she is, you should know that her Descendants take her life seriously. Her 
full story has never been told through the entertainment industry and although people have taken her legacy and disrespected her through what was supposed to be comedy, this project will make sure that she is revered the way that she deserves to be. The 
Matriarchs of the family are especially my concern because they have not
 had the peace to know that an appropriate depiction of her life story 
has been told to the masses, so please consider them as well when giving your contribution. It is my objective to bring her story to 
life in a manner that will satisfy the Matriarchs of the family and 
allow them to have assurance that her life and legacy are represented 
properly as well as get the project done while they are still with us to enjoy
 it.  
With all that is being done for Queen Harriet through this project, we are opening the door for you to help us! There is a lot to do and we are working extremely hard setting the stage for her to be properly memorialized today! Your participation in giving and sharing the word about the project is showing your honor to her! I am   VERY
 thankful for the option to use crowd funding through Indiegogo, because
 it is an awesome service that allows us as a community the ability to partner on projects that are of importance to us and get it done! I do not want to be at the mercy of trying to convince someone in the entertainment industry as to why her story is worth telling. There is a MAJOR demand for her story and this demand
 has not been recognized since 1978 when Queen Cicely Tyson represented her in "A Woman Called Moses".  

Also,
 if we were not crowd funding through Indiegogo and this project was 
taken on by a major production company, I could very well lose the creative control over the story line. That would mean that scenes, characters and other very important information would be cut out from the story when I feel they deserve and need to be there.  So, Indiegogo has given us the ability to reach 
out to you, share our vision, and use 100% of the money that is raised 
by this campaign towards making her story the best that it can possibly 
be. This is why we’re
 here on Indiegogo with this campaign! 
Donations or not, we realize that a lot of people may not be in the position to freely give without receiving anything so we don't want to come across as if we want something for nothing because we don't! So
 we decided to show you how grateful we are for your contribution by returning a perk to you as a thank you for believing in the movement. Queen Harriet's life has had an impact on all of us regardless of race, culture, sex or age and we will ALL
 benefit from her story being told, not just a particular group of 
people. So as a contributor, you will be gifted with promotional gifts which are absolutely phenomenal and they will remind you how important Freedom and Purpose are to your success! We absolutely love that you are supporting our Ancestor.  PLEASE NOTE: PERK FULFILLMENT WILL BEGIN ONCE CAMPAIGN IS OVER
           Take a look at the wonderful gifts we give to our Contributors!





Queen Harriet is the ultimate example of someone who took control over her own destiny and freed herself from an environment that was structured to hold her down! We would love to have your support and see you wearing one of our promotional items to spread the message of FREEDOM! Help us honor Queen Moses and give your support today! Don't delay! NO AMOUNT IS TOO SMALL! 


 Other Ways You Can Help We know everyone can not give 
monetarily, however everyone can give something. Although we wish that 
you could help us monetarily, don't let that be the reason that you 
don't help at all. A few ways that you can help us is to:  
Spread the word about our campaign!
Ask your friends and family to make noise about what we are doing!
Come back and give when you have the ability to!
Keep sending us positive energy and prayers through our project!
If you would like to volunteer to assist us in some way, send us a message!
Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you so much for supporting us and for loving Queen 
Harriet! We are excited about our project and pray that we all continue 
to pursue our freedom like she did by any means necessary!

"I had reasoned this out in my mind, there was one of two things I had a right to, liberty or death; If I couldn't have one, I would have the other." - Harriet Tubman

story:
A Short Summary

The Boss, a power hungry, 'Capitalist King' hangs in a trash chute, waist down in filth, and he relishes every bit of it. When he is saved by a fireman, two detectives are assigned to the case, a young woman thirsty for justice and an old veteran ready to retire. She suspects the Boss's pleasure in this filthy torture; but, before she can solve the mystery, he overrides her -- bringing the young detective to her death. Boss is about power hungry individuals living in a Capitalist society, playing by their own rules and who will stop at nothing to satisfy their inner needs and desires. A very relevant film as it touches on today’s controversies regarding power, money, and sex.

Who We Are

Xeba Zareie (Producer & Director of Photography) – an inspired young film student at the University of Miami. As a lover of the power of cinema, I seek to create stories and images that resonate the true strength of this artistic medium. My dream is to connect humanity together, using the power of these untold perspectives. I'm sure we can all agree that we've felt that feeling, you know, when the film ends and the credits roll. When it is all over and you realize how moved you feel. Films touch and inspire people and that is what I am striving towards in all of my work as a filmmaker.

Matt Rubino (Director) – an experienced director and cinematographer. He has been using a camera since he was a young child. His curiosity for the medium sparked him to make his first film when he was only 9 about Legos! He is in his last year at the graduate program at University of Miami and has just had his Hard Corn film get accepted to the Cine Pobre Film Festival.

The writer – prefers to remain anonymous; however, he is a veteran screenwriter, producer, and director with more than three decades of experience in the film industry. 

The Impact

Ø  The more money you guys help us to raise for the project, the higher the production quality can be for the final cut! We want to be able to compensate the artists for their help; as, it is important to support the community so we can all evolve together!

Ø  If you too believe in the importance of our project and want to help but can't afford to contribute money, you can still pitch in by sharing this campaign with as many people as possible: with friends and family, on your social media and all over the Internet. Just remember to use the indiegogo Share Tools! Raising awareness will not only help get the word out about this important story, but you could also help someone who might want to contribute discover our campaign. With your help, together we can make this project a reality!

What We Need & What You Get

Aside from compensating all of the actors for bringing this story to life, providing them with food and reimbursing them for their travels, we are looking to compensate engineers as well. We will be employing student engineers to help design and build the trash shoot, that will allow camera access, in which the Boss will be wedged for the opening scene. Additionally we will need their help and expertise to build a toilet that will allow us to film from the hole in which waste flushes down. Last, but not least, we will need to feed the crew on these long shoot days and provide establishments with whatever they need to let us shoot on location.
